caption.p: Codetection of (A) adenine and guanine in native B9-plasmid DNA. (B) Adenine and guanine in native C. elegans RNA. (C) Example cyclic voltammograms of the multiplex detection of nucleobases with simultaneously increasing rat serum volume. (D) Series dilution showing a linear relationship between rat serum concentration and peak oxidative current between 4 and 100 Î¼L/mL for all three nucleobase peaks.
